revision.text: Possibly: Remarks on XII historical designs of Raphael, and the Musæum Græcum et Ægyptiacum, or, antiquities of Greece and Egypt, illustrated by prints, intended to be published from Mr. Dalton's drawings. In answer to A letter of inquiry concerning those works. (John Dalton). (London : printed for M. Cooper, at the Globe, in Pater-Noster Row, MDCCLII. [1752]) http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2314075~S5
